DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read API connectors for authentication flows
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the API connectors used in user authentication flows, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read API connectors for authentication flows
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read the API connectors used in user authentication flows, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read API connectors for authentication flows
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write API connectors for authentication flows
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create and manage the API connectors used in user authentication flows, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write API connectors for authentication flows
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read, create and manage the API connectors used in user authentication flows, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write API connectors for authentication flows
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create and manage the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.
